name: CentauriBot.001
description:
Note: WebGL isn't the best for performance and can lead to choppy gameplay. If this happens, please download the game and play that instead. 

In the star system of Alpha Centauri there exists colony A0053.  This colony made their home on a hostile planet within the system.  Their goal was to terraform the planet for future colonists to join them, however an undetected meteor shower struck the colony taking out many of their generators along with the atmospheric beacon.  With the beacon down the colonists were being exposed to the harsh atmosphere rapidly, as a fail safe the automated systems forced all the colonists to go into a cryo stasis, while the Centauri bots fixed the colony.  However, the Centauri bots were infected with a disastrous bug!  Altering the programming of the Centauri bots infecting all with the exception of the prototype, 001.  You, Centauri Bot-001 are the last hope of the colony.  Save A0053!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse: Grapple

A game made with love by: 

Gran Vals

Matthew Flores

Jonathan Tu

Hxdurian
